name: "Turn-Based" Chaos
description:
"Turn-Based" Chaos is a simple board game played in real time. Tap anywhere to move your little green robot towards other spaces.

The game comes with a Survival game mode and a very short Campaign game mode.
There is nothing restricting the speed that you can act; this game can be played infinitely fast. It's possible to get extremely far in Survival within half a minute!
Some enemies and traps act based on a time-interval, and some act based on when you act.
Well-crafted voice-recorded audio plays after each enemy you defeat.

Note: This game is currently going through the Android game review process before it is allowed on the Play Store. It should be on there in a week!
